summary: A cowardly young man, a bitter young woman and a helpless child live on the docks, spend their days full of ennui watching a dredge dig the same hole day in and day out, chased around by ... See full summary Â»
cast: George K. Arthur|Georgia Hale|Bruce Guerin|Otto Matieson|Nellie Bly Baker|Olaf Hytten|Stuart Holmes
title: The Salvation Hunters
